tier.item: (26) Sapaira sapaira ana, ane kene wowine sa-mia,
Te Wa Sabusaburengki ana a-s<um>umbele te kadola.
`Once upon a time, there was a lady, and her name was Wa
Sabusaburengki. Wa Sabusaburengki was going to cut off a chicken's
head. Just as she was about to cut off its head, that chicken said "......".'

tier.item: `(For) that husking, you take off the husk of the coconut. The way to do it,
you slash it with a machete. That slashing, you use the machete to hit into
the coconut. You hit in with it, until you've gone all round the coconut.
`(For) that husking, you take off the husk of the coconut. The way to do it,
you slash it with a machete. That slashing, you use the machete to hit into
the coconut. You hit in with it, until you've gone all round the coconut.
Te benusi iso, to-'ambe te benu nu kaluku. Te cara=no, to-simbi='e te kabali. Te simbi iso, to-taha=ako='e na kabali di kaluku. To-taha=ako='e, sampe to-pali='e na kaluku. Maka to-benu=si='e.

TOP husking yon 1PL.R-take CORE husk GEN coconut TOP method=3GEN 1PL.R-slash=3P CORE machete TOP slash yon 1PL.R-hit.in=APPL=3P NOM machete OBL coconut 1PL.R-hit.in=APPL=3P such.that 1PL.R-go.around=3P NOM coconut and.then 1PL.R-husk=DIR=3P

(For) that husking, you take off the husk of the coconut. The way to do it, you slash it with a machete. That slashing, you use the machete to hit into the coconut. You hit in with it, until you've gone all round the coconut. Then you husk it.

tier.item: (31) Po'oli sambahaea, ku-helawe=mo ki'iki'i. Pasi ku-helawe
i koranga. Te koranga=su ane kene i Walobu,
OBL garden garden=1SG.GEN exist and Walobu
ane 'uka kene i, i Katapi. Te koranga=su
i Katapi, te hembula-ti='e te jambu, lima-ta'o-mo
OBL Katapi CORE plant-APPL=3P CORE jambu five-year=PF
`After I finish my prayers, I rest a little bit. When I'm rested, I get ready to
go out. Then I head off to the garden. Well, my gardens, I have (one) in
Walobu, I have one in Katapi as well. My garden in Katapi, it's planted
with jambus, and I've been getting a crop for the last five years now.'
(31) Po'oli sambahaea, ku-helawe=mo ki'iki'i. Pasi ku-helawe
i koranga. Te koranga=su ane kene i Walobu,
OBL garden TOP garden=1SG.GEN exist and OBL Walobu
ane 'uka kene i, i Katapi. Te koranga=su
i Katapi, te hembula-ti='e te jambu, lima-ta'o-mo
OBL Katapi CORE plant-APPL=3P CORE jambu five-year=PF
`After I finish my prayers, I rest a little bit. When I'm rested, I get ready to
go out. Then I head off to the garden. Well, my gardens, I have (one) in
Walobu, I have one in Katapi as well. My garden in Katapi, it's planted
with jambus, and I've been getting a crop for the last five years now.'

Po'oli sambahaea, ku-helawe=mo ki'iki'i. Pasi ku-helawe ki'iki'i, ku-makanu=mo. Maka la'a=mo ku-wila i koranga. Te koranga=su ane kene i Walobu, ane 'uka kene i, i Katapi. Te koranga=su i Katapi, te hembula-ti='e te jambu, lima-ta'o-mo no-ba'e.

finish prayers 1SG.S/A-rest=PF little after 1SG.S/A-rest little 1SG-make.ready=PF and.then just=PF 1SG-go OBL garden TOP garden=1SG.GEN exist and OBL Walobu exist also and Katapi garden=1SG.GEN OBL OBL TOP OBL Katapi CORE plant-APPL=3P CORE jambu five-year=PF 3R.S/A-fruit

After I finish my prayers, I rest a little bit. When I'm rested, I get ready to go out. Then I head off to the garden. Well, my gardens, I have (one) in Walobu, I have one in Katapi as well. My garden in Katapi, it's planted with jambus, and I've been getting a crop for the last five years now.
